name: Association Française des Entreprises Privées / French Association of Large Companies
goal: L’Afep a pour objectif de contribuer à l’élaboration d’un environnement favorable au développement de l’activité économique et de porter la vision des entreprises qui la composent auprès des pouvoirs publics français, des institutions européennes et des organisations internationales.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- financial market regulation: Capital Markets Union, Prospectus, EMIR, ESAs Review, Sustainable Finance, ESEF, FTT
- company law, corporate governance, CSR: EU Company Law Package, Shareholder Rights Directive, Market Abuse Regulation, Gender balance on Boards, Non-financial Reporting, Supply chain
- climate change, energy, environment: international negotiations on climate change, ETS, non-ETS, Circular Economy, Energy Taxation, Environmental state aid guidelines
- intellectual property: IPRED, e-commerce
- internal market: whistleblowers
- digital single market: data protection, privacy shield
- taxation: CBCR, BEPS, patent boxes, list of non-cooperative jurisdictions, CCTB/CCCTB, digital taxation
- trade: Brexit, Investment Protection, EU trade negotiations
